rooms.description: Entrance hall with Vastu compliant positioning, facing east to welcome positive energy.
Open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen. Natural light from large windows and courtyard views, ensuring a minimalist design with ample space for furniture and decor.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated into the living area with minimal cabinetry, energy-efficient appliances, and an island counter. Vastu-compliant placement ensuring a smooth flow of energy.
Guest bathroom accessible from the living area or corridor, designed with water elements in mind for Vastu balance.
Built-in storage space to maximize functionality and maintain a minimalist aesthetic.

openings.description: Opens to a central courtyard providing natural light and ventilation for the open-plan living area and kitchen.

garden.description: Large garden with native landscaping designed in accordance with Vastu principles, offering calm green spaces and enhancing home energy.
